summary: Replaces soupy consolized tree stump textures with detailed high resolution textures.
descriptionHtml:
While reading the Skyrim performance\\IQ review on [H]ard|OCP, I came across one of several screenshots illustrating Bethesda\'s strange tendency to juxtapose low res textures next to hi res textures. Most notorious of all is this tree stump, which I\'ve seen referenced at least 3 times now:
http://www.hardocp.com/image.html?image=MTMyMTgxNzE5NWhZSUJ3N2pJbG5fNl8xMF9sLmpwZw==

So I\'m \"fixing\" the tree stumps... Readme below:


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
SPARTAN VI\'s - HiRes Tree Stumps
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v1.3
Date: 12/10/2011
Category: Textures
Author: SPARTAN VI

Description
===========
Replaced soupy low res wood stump textures with high resolution detailed textures.

1.1, reduced color saturation.
1.2, reduced luster, added chopping block (Fhaarkas)
1.3, fixed alpha on splinters.



Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file.
4. Launch Skyrim!

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the \"treepineforestcut01.dds\" and \"treepineforestcut01_n.dds\" files located in your
   %Skyrim\\data\\textures\\landscape\\trees\\ directory

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Please report bugs to me at skyrimnexus.com or bethsoft.com forums.

Contact
=======
If you want to get a hold of me, I\'m at the bethsoft forums as SPARTAN VI.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS4- http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod (such as include it in a larger texture pack), but please give credit.
author: SPARTAN VI and Fhaarkas
